verbose_text: Previously, we synthesized a series of EGCG fatty acid monoester derivatives by lipase catalyzed transesterification and found that addition of long acyl chains (C16-18) enhanced the anti-influenza virus activity of EGCG up to 44-fold.
evidence: acid monoester derivatives by lipase-catalyzed transesterification and found that addition of long acyl chains (C16-18) enhanced the anti-influenza virus activity of EGCG
